Title: Kathakali performances featuring episodes from The Ramayana
Content: The month of Karkkidakam is a time when Kathakali plays based on the epic Ramayana get prime attention. ‘Seethaswayamvaram’, ‘Balivadham’, and ‘Thoranayudham’ are the ones that are frequently staged,
Author: Hareesh N. Nampoothiri
Description: The month of Karkkidakam is a time when Kathakali plays based on the epic Ramayana get prime attention. ‘Seethaswayamvaram’, ‘Balivadham’, and ‘Thoranayudham’ are the ones that are frequently staged,
